properties.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa Monica Range
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 2 at 3:21AM PST until March 2 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow showers through mid morning. Snow levels were around
3000 feet this morning. There could be an additional 1 inch of
snow this morning across the Eastern San Gabriel Mountains.
Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches are expected, except
up to 6 inches across the eastern San Gabriel Mountains above
5000 feet. North to northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts to
55 mph will occur through mid morning. A Wind advisory will
likely replace the Winter Weather Advisory after it expires.

* WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains excluding the Santa
Monica Range.

* WHEN...Until 8 AM PST this morning.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The best chance for snow will occur across
the eastern San Gabriel Mountains through mid morning. Be
prepared for reduced visibility at times in snow, blowing snow,
and fog. Plan on very slippery road and ice conditions.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling
1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING
